= Installation Overview =

  # Install Bloom
  # Signup as for Admob as a publisher
  # Modify `settings.py`
  # Use the `admob` template tag in a template

= Installation Guide =

=== 1. Install Bloom ===

The process is documented here...

=== 2. Signup as for Admob as a publisher ===

To display Admob ads you will need to signup for an Admob account:

[http://www.admob.com/s/home/register/ http://www.admob.com/s/home/register/]

Note your `admob_site_id` - you will need it soon.

=== 2. Modify `settings.py` ===

Add `bloom.ad` to `INSTALLED_APPS`:

{{{
INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'bloom.device',
    ...
)
}}}

Add the settings `BLOOM_ADMOB_DEBUG` and `BLOOM_ADMOB_SITE_ID`:

{{{
BLOOM_ADMOB_DEBUG = True # Switch to False when you are ready to serve ads in Production
BLOOM_ADMOB_SITE_ID = 'get-from-admob'
}}}

=== 3. Use the `admob` template tag in a template ===

To display an Admob ad on a page we can easierly we can use the `admob` template tag in the `admob` tag library:

{{{
{% load admob %}

{% admob %}
}}}
